GV05brupsb5u:4: pūrṇam adaḥ pūrṇam idaṃ pūrṇāt pūrṇam udacyate /
GV05brupsb5u:13: BrhUpBh_5,1.1 pūrṇamadaḥ pūrṇaṃ na kutaścid vyāvṛttaṃ vyāpītyetat /
GV05brupsb5u:17: tat sampūrṇamākāśavad vyāpi nirantaraṃ nirupādhikaṃ ca tadevedaṃ sopādhikaṃ nāmarūpasthaṃvyavahārāpannaṃ pūrṇaṃ svena rūpeṇa paramātmanā vyāpyeva nopādhiparicchinnena viśeṣātmanā /
GV05brupsb5u:18: tadidaṃ viśeṣāpannaṃ kāryātmakaṃ brahma pūrṇāt kāraṇātmana udacyata udricyata udgacchatītyetat /
GV05brupsb5u:19: yadyapi kāryātmanodricyate tathāpi yat svarūpaṃ pūrṇatvaṃ paramātmabhāvaṃ tanna jāhāti pūrṇamevodricyate /
GV05brupsb5u:20: pūrṇasya kāryātmano brahmaṇaḥ pūrṇa pūrṇatvamādāya gṛhītvā ātmasvarūpaikarasatvamāpadya,
GV05brupsb5u:21: vidyayā avidyākṛtaṃ bhūtamātropādhisaṃsargajamanyatvāvabhāsaṃ tiraskṛtya pūrṇamevānantaramavāhyaṃ prajñānaghanaikarasasvabhāvaṃ kevalaṃ brahmāvaśiṣyate /
GV05brupsb5u:24: idaṃ pūrṇamiti brahma vā idamagra āsīdityasyārthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:26: ato 'daḥśabdavācyaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma tadevedaṃ pūrṇaṃ kāryasthaṃ nāmarūpopādhisaṃyuktamavidyayodriktam /
GV05brupsb5u:28_0: tadyadātmānameva paraṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma viditvāhamadaḥ pūrṇaṃ brahmāsmītyevaṃ pūrṇamādāya
GV05brupsb5u:30: yaḥ sarvopaniṣadartho brahma sa eṣo 'nena mantreṇānūdyata uttarasambandhārtham /
GV05brupsb5u:31: brahmavidyāsādhanatvena hi vakṣyamāṇāni sādhanānyoṅkāradamadānadayākhyāni vidhitsitāni khilaprakaraṇasambandhātsarvopāsanāṅgabhūtāni ca /
GV05brupsb5u:33: udriktaṃ kāryaṃ vartamānakāle 'pi pūrṇameva paramārthavastubhūtaṃ dvaitarūpeṇa /
GV05brupsb5u:34: punaḥ pralayakāle pūrṇasya kāryasya pūrṇatāmādāyā'tmani dhitvā pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate kāraṇarūpam /
GV05brupsb5u:39: yathā ca jalaṃ satyaṃ tadudbhavāśca taraṅgaphelabudbudādayaḥ samudrātmabhūtā evā'virbhāvatirobhāvadharmiṇaḥ paramārthasatyā eva /
GV05brupsb5u:40: evaṃ sarvamidaṃ dvaitaṃ paramārthasatyameva jalataraṅgādisthānīyaṃ samudrajalasthānīyaṃ tu paraṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb5u:41_0: evaṃ ca kila dvaitasya satyatve karmakāṇḍasya prāmāṇyaṃ yadā punardvaitaṃ dvaitamivāvidyākṛtaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:41_1: mṛgatṛṣṇikāvadanṛtamadvaitameva paramārthatastadā kila karmakāṇḍaṃ viṣayābhāvādapramāṇaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:44: tadvirodhaparijihīrṣayā śrutyaitaduktaṃ kāryakāraṇayoḥ satyatvaṃ samudravatpūrṇamada ityādineti /
GV05brupsb5u:50: yathāhiṃsansarvabhūtānyanyatra tīrthebhya iti hiṃsā sarvabhūtaviṣayotsargeṇa nivāritā tīrthe viśiṣṭaviṣaye jyotiṣṭomādāvanujñāyate /
GV05brupsb5u:51: na ca tathā vastuviṣaya ihādvaitaṃ brahmotsargeṇa pratipādya punastadekadeśe 'pavadituṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb5u:54: yathātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātīti grahaṇāgrahaṇayoḥ puruṣādhīnatvādvikalpo bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:55: na tviha tathā vastuviṣaye dvaitaṃ vā syādadvaitaṃ veti vikalpaḥ sambhavatyapuruṣatantratvādātmavastunaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:59_2: niścitārthāḥ saṃśayaviparyāsāśaṅkārahitāḥ sarvāḥ samudre prakṣiptāḥ syurakiñcitkaratvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:66: nanu brahmaṇo dvaitādvaitātmakatve samudrādidṛṣṭāntā vidyante kathamucyate bhavataikasya dvaitādvaitatvaṃ viruddhamiti /
GV05brupsb5u:69: nityāniravayavavastuviṣayaṃ hi viruddhatvamavocāma dvaitādvaitatvasya na kāryaviṣaye sāvayave /
GV05brupsb5u:73: na hi jananamaraṇādyanarthaśatasahasrabhedasamākulaṃ samudravanādivatsāvayavamanekarasaṃ brahma dhyeyatvena vijñeyatvena vā śrutyopadiśyate /
GV05brupsb5u:76: anekadhādarśanāpavādācca“mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati“iti /
GV05brupsb5u:78: yacca na kriyate na sa śāsrārthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:82: yattūktaṃ vedaikadeśasyāprāmāṇyaṃ karmaviṣaye dvaitābhāvādadvaite ca prāmāṇyamiti /
GV05brupsb5u:85: na hi dvaitamadvaitaṃ vā vastu jātamātrameva puruṣaṃ jñāpayitvā paścātkarma vā brahmavidyāṃ vopadiśati śāsram /
GV05brupsb5u:88: yena dvaitasya satyatvamupadiśya paścādātmanaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādayecchāsram /
GV05brupsb5u:89: nāpi pāṣaṇḍibhirapi prasthāpitāḥ śāsrasya prāmāṇyaṃ na gṛhṇīyuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:91: athaivaṃ sati tadaudāsīnyasvarūpāvasthāne phale prāpte śāsrasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratyarthitvaṃ nivartate /
GV05brupsb5u:92: tadabhāvācchāsrasyāpi śāsratvaṃ taṃ prati nivartata eva /
GV05brupsb5u:93: tathā pratipuruṣaṃ parisamāptaṃ śāsramiti na śāsravirodhagandho 'pyasti /
GV05brupsb5u:95: anyatamāvasthāne hi virodhaḥ syādavasthitasyetaretarāpekṣatvāttu śāsraśiṣyaśāsanānāṃ nānyatamo 'pyavatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:96: sarvasamāptau tu kasya viredha āśaṅkyetādvaite kevale śive siddhe /
GV05brupsb5u:100: yasmindvaitaviṣaye 'nyonyopadeśaḥ so 'nyo dvaitaṃ cānyadeveti samudradṛṣṭānto viruddhaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:102_1: karṇaḥ kevala upadeśasya grahītā devadattastu nopadeṣṭā nāpyupadeśasya grahīteti
GV05brupsb5u:106: oṃ khaṃ brahmeti mantro 'yaṃ cānyatrāviniyukta iha brāhmaṇena dhyānakarmaṇi viniyujyate /
GV05brupsb5u:107: atra ca brahmeti viśeṣyābhidhānaṃ khamiti viśeṣaṇam /
GV05brupsb5u:108: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayośca sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśo nīlotpalavat khaṃ brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:112: tathā ca śrutyantarāt“etadālambanaṃ śreṣṭhametadālambanaṃ param” “omityātmānaṃ yuñjīta” “omityetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta““omityevaṃ dhyāyatha ātmānam“ityādeḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:114: yathā'nyatromiti śaṃsatyomityudgāyatītyevamādau svādhyāyārambhāpavargayoścoṅkāraprayogo viniyogādavagamyate na ca tathār'thāntaramihāvagamyate /
GV05brupsb5u:116: yadyapi brahmātmādiśabdā brahmaṇo vācakāstathāpi śrutiprāmāṇyādbrahmaṇo nediṣṭhamabhidhānamoṅkāraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:124: tatra khamiti bhautike khe pratītirmā bhūdityāha-khaṃ purāṇaṃ ciratanaṃ khaṃ paramātmākāśamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:125: yattatparamātmākāśaṃ purāṇaṃ khaṃ taccakṣurādyaviṣayatvānnirālambanamaśakyaṃ grahītumiti śraddhābhaktibhyāṃ bhāvaviśeṣeṇa coṅkāra āveśayati /
GV05brupsb5u:126: yathā viṣṇvaṅgāṅkitāyāṃ śilādipratimāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ loka evam /
GV05brupsb5u:127: vāyuraṃ khaṃ vāyurasminvidyata iti vāyuraṃ khaṃ khamātraṃ khamityucyate na purāṇaṃ khamityevamāha sma /
GV05brupsb5u:130: vāyure hi khe mukhyaḥ svaśabdavyavahārastasmānmukhe saṃpratyayo yukta iti manyate /
GV05brupsb5u:131: tatra yadi purāṇaṃ khaṃ brahma nirūpādhisvarūpaṃ yadi vā vāyuraṃ khaṃ sopādhikaṃ brahma sarvathāpyoṅkāraḥ pratīkatvenaiva pratimāvatsādhanatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GV05brupsb5u:132: etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ iti śrutyantarāt /
GV05brupsb5u:136: tenābhidhānena yadveditavyaṃ brahma prakāśyamānamabhidhīyamānaṃ veda sādhako vijānātyupalabhate /
GV05brupsb5u:141: oṃ khaṃ brahmeti sāmānādhikaraṇyāttasya stutiridānīṃ vedatvena /
GV05brupsb5u:143: etatprabhava etadātmakaḥ sarvaṃ ṛgyajuḥsāmādibhedabhinna eva oṅkāraḥ tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni ityādiśrutyantarāt /
GV05brupsb5u:144: itaścāyaṃ veda oṅkāro yadveditavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ veditavyamoṅkāro vedaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:151: tasminhi prayujyamāne sādhanatvena sarvo vedaḥ prayukto bhavatīti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:155: trayāḥ prājāpatyāḥ prajāpatau pitari brahmacaryam ūṣuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:157: uṣitvā brahmacaryaṃ devā ūcur bravītu no bhavān iti /
GV05brupsb5u:158: tebhyo haitad akṣaram uvāca da iti /
GV05brupsb5u:164_1: prajāpatyāḥ prajāpaterapatyāni prājāpatyāste kiṃ prajāpattau pitari brahmacaryaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:167: te coṣitvā brahmacaryaṃ kimakurvannityucyate - teṣāṃ devā ūcuḥ pitaraṃ prajāpatim /
GV05brupsb5u:170: tebhya evamarthibhyo haitadakṣaraṃ varṇamātramuvāca da iti /
GV05brupsb5u:171: uktvā ca tānpapraccha pitā kiṃ vyajñāsiṣṭā3iti /
GV05brupsb5u:175: devā ūcurdābhyatādāntā yūyaṃ svabhāvato 'to dāntā bhavateti no 'smānāttha kathayati /
GV05brupsb5u:179: atha hainaṃ manuṣyā ūcur bravītu no bhavān iti /
GV05brupsb5u:180: tebhyo haitad evākṣaram uvāca da iti /
GV05brupsb5u:187: svabhāvato lubdhā yūyamato yathāśakti saṃvibhajata datteti no 'smānāttha kimanyadbrūyānno hitamiti manuṣyāḥ //2//
GV05brupsb5u:190: atha hainam asurā ūcur bravītu no bhavān iti /
GV05brupsb5u:191: tebhyo haitad evākṣaram uvāca da iti /
GV05brupsb5u:196: tad etad evaiṣā daivī vāg anuvadati stanayitnur da da da iti /
GV05brupsb5u:198: tad etat trayaṃ śikṣed damam dānam dayām iti // BrhUp_5,2.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:201: krūrā yūyaṃ hiṃsādiparā ato dayadhvaṃ prāṇiṣu dayāṃ kuruteti /
GV05brupsb5u:203: yaḥ pūrvaṃ prajāpatirdevādīnanuśaśāsa so 'dyāpyanuśāstyeva daivyā stanayitnulakṣaṇayā vācā kathameṣā śrūyate daivo vāk /
GV05brupsb5u:204: kāsau stanayitnurda da da iti dāmyata datta dayadhvamityeṣāṃ vākyānāmupalakṣaṇāya trirdakāra uccāryate 'nukṛtirna tu stanayitnuśabdastrireva saṃkhyāniyamasya loko 'prasiddhatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:206: kiṃ tat trayamityucyate damaṃ dānaṃ dayāmiti śikṣedupādadyātprajāpateranuśāsanamasmābhiḥ kartavyamityevaṃ kartavyamityevaṃ matiṃ kuryāt /
GV05brupsb5u:207: tathā ca smṛtiḥ - trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśatamātmanaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:208: kāmaḥ krodhastathā lobhastasmādetat trayaṃ tyajet iti /
GV05brupsb5u:211: te vā kathaṃ vivekena pratipannāḥ prajāpatermanogataṃ samānenaiva dakāravarṇamātreṇeti parābhiprāyajñā vikalpayanti /
GV05brupsb5u:212: atraika āhuradāntatvādānātvādayāsutvairaparādhitvamātmano manyamānāḥ śaṅkitā eva prajāpatāvūṣuḥ kiṃ no vakṣyatīti /
GV05brupsb5u:214: loke 'pi hi prasiddhaṃ putrāḥ śiṣyāścānuśāsyāḥ santo doṣānnivartayitavyā iti /
GV05brupsb5u:216: damāditraye ca dakārānvayādātmano doṣānurūpyeṇa devādīnāṃ vivekena pratipattuṃ ceti /
GV05brupsb5u:217: phalaṃ tvetadātmadoṣajñāne sati doṣānnivartayituṃ śakyate 'lpenāpyupadeśena dakāramātreṇeti /
GV05brupsb5u:218: nanvetat trayāṇāṃ devādīnāmanuśāsanaṃ devādibhirapyekaikamevopādeyamadyatve 'pi na tu trayaṃ manuṣyaiḥ śikṣitavyamiti /
GV05brupsb5u:219: atrocyate - pūrvairdaivādibhirapyekaikamevopādeyamadyatve 'pi na tu trayaṃ manuṣyaiḥ śikṣitavyamiti /
GV05brupsb5u:220: athavā na devā asurā vānye kecana vidyante manuṣyebhyaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:221_0: manuṣyāṇāmevādāntā ye 'nyairuttamairguṇaiḥ saṃpannāste devā lobhapradhānā manuṣyāstathā
GV05brupsb5u:221_1: hiṃsāparāḥ krūrā asurāsta eva manuṣyā adāntatvādidoṣakṣatrayamapekṣya devādiviśabdabhājo
GV05brupsb5u:222: ato manuṣyaireva śikṣitavyametat trayamiti tadapekṣayaiva prajāpatinopadiṣṭatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:223: tathā hi manuṣyaḥ adāntā lubdhāḥ krūrāśca dṛśyante /
GV05brupsb5u:224: tathā ca smṛtiḥ kāmaḥ krodhastathā lobhastasmādetat trayaṃ tyajet iti //3//
GV05brupsb5u:233: abhiharanty asmai svāś cānye ca ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:235: dadaty asmai svāś cānye ca ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:237: eti svargaṃ lokaṃ ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,3.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:241_0: tatra nirupādhikasya brahmaṇo darśanamatikrāntamathādhunā sopādhikasya tasyaivābhyudayaphalāni
GV05brupsb5u:245: yasmiñśākalyabrāhmaṇānte nāmarūpakarmaṇāmupasaṃhāra ukto digvibhāgadvāreṇa tadetatsarvabhūtapratiṣṭhaṃ sarvabhūtātmabhūtaṃ hṛdayaṃ prajāpatiḥ prajānāṃ sraṣṭā /
GV05brupsb5u:254_0: abhiharanti hṛterāhṛtikarmaṇo hṛ ityetadrūpamiti yo veda yasmāddhṛdayāya brahmaṇe
GV05brupsb5u:254_1: svāścendriyāṇyanye ca viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ kāryamabhiharantihṛdayaṃ ca bhoktrarthamabhiharati /
GV05brupsb5u:255: ato hṛdayanāmno hṛ ityetadakṣaramiti yo vedāsmai viduṣe 'bhiharanti svāśca jñātayo 'nye cāsaṃbaddhāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:258: tathā da ityetadapyekākṣarametadapi dānārthasya dadāterda ityetadrūpaṃ hṛdayanāmākṣaratvena nibaddham /
GV05brupsb5u:259: atrāpi hṛdayāya brahmaṇo svāśca karaṇānyanye ca viṣayāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vīryaṃ dadati hṛdayaṃ ca bhoktre dadāti svaṃ vīryamato dakāra ityevaṃ yo vedāsmai dadati svāścānye ca /
GV05brupsb5u:261: iṇo gatyarthasya yamityetadrūpamasminnāmni nibaddhamiti yo veda sa svargaṃ lokameti /
GV05brupsb5u:262: evaṃ nāmākṣarādapīdṛśaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti kimu vaktavyaṃ hṛdayasvarūpo pāsanāditi hṛdayastutaye nāmākṣaropanyāsaḥ //1//
GV05brupsb5u:266: tad vai tad etad eva tad āsa /
GV05brupsb5u:268: sa yo haitaṃ mahad yakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti jayatīmāṃl lokān -- jita in nv asāv asat -- ya evam etan mahad yakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:271: BrhUpBh_5,4.1 tasyaiva hṛdayākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyamityupāsanaṃ vidhitsannāha-tattaditi hṛdayaṃ brahma parāmṛṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:279: kiṃ punaretadevā'sa yaduktaṃ hṛdayaṃ brahmeti taditi tṛtīyastacchabdo viniyuktaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:280: kiṃ taditi viśeṣato nirdiśati satyameva sacca tyacca mūrtaṃ cāmūrtaṃ ca satyaṃ brahma pañcabhūtātmakamityetat /
GV05brupsb5u:281: sa yaḥ kaścitsatyātmānametaṃ mahanmahattvādyakṣaṃ pūjyaṃ prathamajaṃ prathamajātaṃ sarvasmātsaṃsāriṇa etadevāgre jātaṃ brahmātaḥ prathamajaṃ veda vijānāti satyaṃ brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:282: tasyedaṃ phalamucyate-yathā satyena brahmaṇeme lokā ātmasātkṛtā jitā evaṃ satyātmānaṃ brahma mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda sa jayatīmāllokān /
GV05brupsb5u:283: kiñca jito vaśīkṛta innvitthaṃ yathā brahmaṇāsau śatruriti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:285: kasyaitatphalamiti punarnigamayati-ya evametanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:297: tad etat tryakṣaraṃ sa-ti-yam iti sa ity ekam akṣaram /
GV05brupsb5u:301: tad etad anṛtam ubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītam /
GV05brupsb5u:310: tāścā'po 'gni hotrādikarmāpavargottarakālaṃ kenaciddṛṣṭena sūkṣmeṇā'tmanā karmasamavāyitvamaparityajantya itarabhūtasahitā eva na kevalāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:312: sarvāṇyeva bhūtāni prāgutpatteravyākṛtāvasthāni kartṛsahitāni nirdiśyanta āpa iti /
GV05brupsb5u:313: tā āpo bījabhūtā jagato 'vyākṛtātmanāvasthitāstā evedaṃ sarvaṃ nāmarūpavikṛtaṃ jagadagra āsurnānyatkiñcidvikārajātamāsīt /
GV05brupsb5u:316: tadetaddhiraṇyagarbhasya sūtrātmano janma yadavyākṛtasya jagato vyākaraṇam /
GV05brupsb5u:322: yatsatyaṃ brahma tat prajāpatiṃ prajānāṃ patiṃ virājaṃ sūryādikaraṇamasṛjatetyanuṣaṅgaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:324: yasmātsarvamevaṃ krameṇa satyādbrahmaṇo jātaṃ tasmānmahatsatyaṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb5u:326: ucyate-ta evaṃ sṛṣṭā devāḥ pitaramapi virājamatītya tadeva satyaṃ brahmopāmate /
GV05brupsb5u:328: tasmātsarvātmanopāsyaṃ tattasyāpi satyasya brahmaṇo nāma satyamiti tadetattryakṣaram /
GV05brupsb5u:333: tatra teṣāṃ prathamottame akṣare sakārayakārau satyam /
GV05brupsb5u:338_0: tadetadanṛtaṃ takārākṣaraṃ mṛtyurūpamubhayataḥ satyena sakārayakāralakṣaṇena parigṛhotaṃvyāptamantarbhāvitaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:339: evaṃ satyabāhulyaṃ sarvasya mṛtyoranṛtasyākiñcitkaratvaṃ ca yo vidvāṃstamevaṃ vidvāṃsamanṛtaṃ kadācitpramādoktaṃ na hinasti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:342: tad yat tat satyam asau sa ādityaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:343: ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣo yaś cāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣas tāv etāv anyo 'nyasmin pratiṣṭhitau /
GV05brupsb5u:344: raśmibhir eṣo 'smin pratiṣṭhitaḥ prāṇair ayam amuṣmin /
GV05brupsb5u:345: sa yadotkramiṣyan bhavati śuddham evaitan maṇḍalaṃ paśyati /
GV05brupsb5u:348: BrhUpBh_5,5.2 asyādhunā satyasya brahmaṇaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣa upāsanamucyate-tadyat /
GV05brupsb5u:349: kiṃ tatsatyaṃ brahma prathamajaṃ kimasau saḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:350: ko 'sāvādityaḥ kaḥ punarasāvādityo ya eṣa ka eṣa ya etasminnādityamaṇḍale puruṣo 'bhimānī so 'sau satyaṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb5u:353: tāvetāvādityākṣisthau puruṣāvekasya satyasya brahmaṇaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣau yasmāttasmādanyonyasminnitaretarasminnādityaścākṣuṣe cākṣuṣaścā'ditye pratiṣṭhitau /
GV05brupsb5u:355: kathaṃ pratiṣṭhitāvityucyate raśmibhiḥ prakāśenānugrahaṃ kurvanneṣa ādityo 'smiṃścākṣuṣe 'dhyātme pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:357: so 'smiñcharīre vijñānamayo bhoktā yadā yasminkāla utkramiṣyanbhavati tadāsau cākṣuṣa ādityapuruṣo raśmīnupasaṃhṛtya kevalenaudāsīnyena rūpeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:358: tadāyaṃ vijñānamayaḥ paśyati śuddhameva kevalaṃ viraśmyetanmaṇḍalaṃ candramaṇḍalamiva /
GV05brupsb5u:361: nainaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ puruṣamurarīkṛtya taṃ pratyanugrahāyaite raśmayaḥ svāmikartavyavaśātpūrvamāgacchanto 'pi punastatkarmakṣayamanurudhyamānā iva nopayanti na pratyāgacchantyenam /
GV05brupsb5u:365: ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣas tasya bhūr iti śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:372: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,5.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:374: BrhUpBh_5,5.3 tatra yo 'sau ko ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ satyanāmā tasya vyāhṛtayo 'vayavāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:376: bhūriti yeyaṃ vyāhṛtiḥ sā tasya śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:378: tatra sāmānyaṃ svayamevāha śruti-ekamekasaṃkhyāyiktaṃ śirastathaitadakṣaramekaṃ bhūriti /
GV05brupsb5u:379: bhuva iti bāhū dvitvasāmānyāddvau bāhū dve ete akṣare /
GV05brupsb5u:380: tathā svariti pratiṣṭhā dve pratiṣṭhe dve ete akṣare /
GV05brupsb5u:384: kāsāvityāha - ahariti ahariti caitadrūpaṃ hanterjahāteśceti yo veda sa hanti jahāti ca pāpmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda //3//
GV05brupsb5u:387: yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣas tasya bhūr iti śiraḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:394: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,5.4 //
GV05brupsb5u:396: BrhUpBh_5,5.4 evaṃ yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣastasya bhūriti śira ityādi sarvaṃ samānam /
GV05brupsb5u:404: tasminn antar hṛdaye yathā vrīhir vā yavo vā /
GV05brupsb5u:405: sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvam idaṃ praśāsti yad idaṃ kiñca // BrhUp_5,6.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:407: BrhUpBh_5,6.1 upādhīnāmanekatvādanekaviśeṣaṇatvācca tasyaiva prakṛtasya brahmaṇo manaupādhiviśiṣṭasyopāsanaṃ vidhitsannāhamanomayo manaḥprāyo manasyupalabhyamānatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:408: manasā copalabhata iti manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyo bhā eva satyaṃ sadbhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ bhāḥ satyo bhāsvara ityetat /
GV05brupsb5u:411: yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā pariṇamata evaṃ parimāṇastasminnantarhṛdaye yogibhirdṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:412: sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasya svabhedajātasyeśānaḥ svāmī /
GV05brupsb5u:413: svāmitve 'pi sati kaścidamātyāditantro 'yaṃ tu na tathā kiṃ tarhyadhipatiradhiṣṭhāya pālayitā /
GV05brupsb5u:414: sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ kiñca yatkiñccitsarvaṃ jagattatsarvaṃ praśāsti /
GV05brupsb5u:416: taṃ tathā yathepāsate tadeva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam //1//
GV05brupsb5u:422: vidyaty enaṃ pāpmano ya evaṃ veda vidyud brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:425: BrhUpBh_5,7.1 tathaivopāsanāntaraṃ satyasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭaphalamārabhyate - vidyudbrahmetyāhuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:426: vidyuto brahmaṇo nirvacanamucyate - vidānādavakhaṇḍanāttamaso medhāndhakāraṃ vidārya hyavabhāsate 'to vidyut /
GV05brupsb5u:427: evaṃ guṇaṃ vidyudbrahmeti yo vedāsai vidyatyavakhaṇḍayati vināśayati pāpmana enamātmānaṃ prati pratikūlabhūtāḥ pāpmāno ye tānsarvānpāpmano 'khaṇḍayatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:428: ya evaṃ veda vidyudbrahmeti tasyānurūpaṃ phalam /
GV05brupsb5u:440: tasyāḥ prāṇa ṛṣabho mano vatsaḥ // BrhUp_5,8.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:442_0: BrhUpBh_5,8.1 punarupāsanāntaraṃ tasyaiva brahmaṇo vāgvai brahmeti vāgiti śabdasrayī
GV05brupsb5u:442_1: tāṃ vācaṃ dhenuṃ dhenuriva dhenuryathā dhenuścaturbhiḥ stanaiḥ stanyaṃ payaḥ kṣarati
GV05brupsb5u:442_2: vatsāyaivaṃ vāgdhenurvakṣyamāṇaiḥ stanaiḥ paya ivānnaṃ kṣarati devādibhyaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:443: ke punaste stanā ye vā te yebhyaḥ kṣarati /
GV05brupsb5u:444: tasyā etasyā vāco dhenvā dvau stanau devā upajīvanti vatsasthānīyāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:453: hanteti manuṣyebhyo 'nnaṃ prayacchanti svadhākāraṃ ca vaṣaṭkāraṃ ca /
GV05brupsb5u:469: ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe /
GV05brupsb5u:474: sa yadotkramiṣyan bhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti // BrhUp_5,9.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:483: yaṃ ghoṣametaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ karṇāvapidhāyāṅgulībhyāmapidhānaṃ kṛtvā śṛṇoti taṃ prajāpatimupāsīta vaiśvānaramagnim /
GV05brupsb5u:485: tatra prāsaṅgikamidamariṣṭalakṣaṇamucyate-so 'tra śarīre bhoktā yadotkramiṣyanbhavati nainaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti //1//
GV05brupsb5u:489: yadā vai puruṣo 'smāl lokāt praiti sa vāyum āgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:490: tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya kham /
GV05brupsb5u:503_0: BrhUpBh_5,10.1 sarveṣāmasminprakaraṇa upāsanānāṃ gatiriyaṃ phalaṃ cocyate-yadā vai
GV05brupsb5u:503_1: puruṣo vidvānasmāllokātpraiti śarīraṃ parityajati sa tadā vāyumāgacchatyantarikṣe
GV05brupsb5u:504: sa vāyustatra svātmani tasmai samprāptāya vijihote svātmāvayavānvigamayati cchidrīkarotyātmānamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:506: ucyate-yathā ratha vakrasya khaṃ chidraṃ prasiddhaparimāṇam /
GV05brupsb5u:507: tena chidreṇa sa vidvānūrdhva ākramata ūrdhvaḥ sangacchati sa ādityamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:508: ādityo brahmalokaṃ jigamiṣormārganirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthitaḥ so 'pyevaṃvida upāsakāya dvāraṃ prayacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:510: yathā lambarasya khaṃ vāditraviśeṣasya cchidraparimāmaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa candramasamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:512: yathā dundubheḥ khaṃ prasiddhaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa lokaṃ prajāpatilokamāgacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:516: taṃ prāpya tasminvasati śāśvatīrnityāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:521: etad vai paramaṃ tapo yad vyāhitas tapyate /
GV05brupsb5u:522: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:523: etad vai paramaṃ tapo yaṃ pretam araṇyaṃ haranti /
GV05brupsb5u:524: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:525: etad vai paramaṃ tapo yaṃ pretam agnāv abhyādadhati /
GV05brupsb5u:526: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,11.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:530: yadyāhito vyādhito jvarādiparigṛhītaḥ sanyattapyate tadetatparamaṃ tapa ityevaṃ cintayet /
GV05brupsb5u:532: tasyaivaṃ cintayato viduṣaḥ karmakṣayahetustadeva tapo bhavatyanindato 'viṣīdataḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:533: sa eva ca tena vijñānatapasā dagdhakilbaṣaḥ paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:536: paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:546: ete ha tv eva devate ekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ gacchataḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:548: kiṃ svid evaivaṃ viduṣe sādhu kuryāṃ kim evāsmā asādhu kuryām iti /
GV05brupsb5u:549: sa ha smāha pāṇinā mā prātṛda /
GV05brupsb5u:550: kas tv enayor ekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ gacchatīti /
GV05brupsb5u:557: sarvāṇi ha vā asmin bhūtāni viśanti /
GV05brupsb5u:558: sarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,12.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:561: tathaitadupāsanāntaraṃ vidhitsannāha-annaṃ brahmānnamadyate yattadbrahmetyeka ācāryā āhustanna tathā grahītavyamannaṃ brahmeti /
GV05brupsb5u:562: anye cā'huḥ prāṇo brahmeti tacca tathā na grahītavyam /
GV05brupsb5u:564: yasmātpūyati klidyate pūtibhāvamāpadyata ṛte prāṇāttatkathaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GV05brupsb5u:572: ata ekaikasya brahmatā nopapadyate yasmāttasmādete ha tvevānnaprāṇadevate ekadhābhūyamekadhābāvaṃ bhūtvā gatvā paramatāṃ paramatvaṃ gacchato brahmatvaṃ prāpnutaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:573: tadetadevamadhyavasya ha smā'ha sma prātṛdo nāma pitarātmanaḥ kiṃsviditisviditi vitarke /
GV05brupsb5u:574: yathā mayā brahma parikalpitamevaṃ viduṣe kiṃsvitsādhu kuryāṃ sādhu śobhanaṃ pūjāṃ kāṃ tvasmai kuryāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:576: annaprāṇau sahabhūto brahmeti vidvānnāsāvasādhukaramena khaṇḍito bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:578: tadevaṃvādinaṃ sa pitā ha smā'ha pāṇinā hastena nivārayanmā prātṛda maivaṃ vocaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:579: kastvenayorannaprāṇayorekadhābhūyaṃ bhūtvā paramatāṃ kastu gacchati na kaścidapi vidvānanena brahmadarśanena paramatāṃ gacchati /
GV05brupsb5u:587: anne hi yasmādimāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni viṣṭānyāśritānyato 'nnaṃ vītyucyate /
GV05brupsb5u:595: yadā tvāyatanavānprāṇī balavāṃśca tadā kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyamāno ramate lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:597: idānīmevaṃvidaḥ phalamāha - sarvāṇi ha vā asminbhūtāni viśantyannaguṇajñānātsarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante prāṇaguṇajñānādya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:605: ukthasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:612: prāṇaśca pradhāna indriyāṇāmukthaṃ ca śasrāṇāmata ukthamityupāsīta /
GV05brupsb5u:613: kathaṃ prāṇa ukthamityāha-prāṇo hi yasmādidaṃ sarvamutthāpayati /
GV05brupsb5u:616: tadupāsanaphalamāha-uddhāsmādevaṃvida ukthavitprāṇavidvīraḥ putra uttiṣṭhati ha dṛṣṭametatphalam /
GV05brupsb5u:617: adṛṣṭaṃ tūkthasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:624: yajuṣaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.2 //
GV05brupsb5u:633: hāsmā evaṃvide sarvāṇi bhūtāni śraiṣṭhyaṃ śreṣṭhabhāvastasmai śraiṣṭhyāya śreṣṭhabhāvāya naḥ śreṣṭho bhavediti /
GV05brupsb5u:640: samyañci hāsmai sarvāṇi bhūtāni śraiṣṭhyāya kalpante /
GV05brupsb5u:641: sāmnaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:646: prāṇe hi yasmātsarvāṇi bhūtāni samyañci saṃgacchante saṃgamanātsāmyāpattihetutvātsāma prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:648: na kevalaṃ saṃgacchanta eva śreṣṭhabhāvāya cāsmai kalpante samarthyante /
GV05brupsb5u:657: kṣatrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.4 //
GV05brupsb5u:660: prāṇau vai kṣattraṃ prasiddhametatprāṇo hi vai kṣattram /
GV05brupsb5u:662: kathaṃ prasiddhatetyāha-trāyate pālayatyenaṃ piṇḍaṃ dehaṃ prāṇaḥ kṣaṇitoḥ śasrādihiṃsitātpunarmāṃsenā'pūrayati yasmāttasmātkṣatatrāṇātprasiddhaṃ kṣattratvaṃ prāṇasya /
GV05brupsb5u:663: vidvatphalamāha-pra kṣattramatraṃ na trāyate 'nyena kenacidityatraṃ kṣattraṃ prāṇaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:665: kṣattrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda //4//
GV05brupsb5u:669: bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur ity aṣṭāv akṣarāṇi /
GV05brupsb5u:670: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brupsb5u:672: sa yāvad eṣu triṣu lokeṣu tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:678: prāṇātmabhūtā ca sā sarvacchandasāṃ cā'tmā prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:683: gāyatryā brāhmaṇamasṛjata triṣṭubhā rājanyaṃ jagatyā vaiśyamati dvijottamasya dvitīyaṃ janma gāyatrīnimittam /
GV05brupsb5u:684: tasmātpradhānā gāyatrī brāhmaṇā vyutthāya brāhmaṇā abhivadanti sa brāhmaṇo vipāpo virajo 'vicikitso brāhmaṇo bhavatītyuttamapuruṣārthasaṃbandhaṃ brāhmaṇasya darśayati /
GV05brupsb5u:685: tacca brāhmaṇatvaṃ gāyatrījanmamūlamato vaktavyaṃ gāyatryāḥ satattvam /
GV05brupsb5u:686: gāyatryā hi yaḥ sṛṣṭo dvijottamo niraṅkuśa evottamapuruṣārthasādhane 'dhikriyate 'tastanmūlaḥ paramapuruṣārthasaṃbandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:692: etadu haivaitadevāsyā gāyatryāḥ padaṃ pādaḥ prathamo bhūmyādilakṣaṇasrailokyātmā /
GV05brupsb5u:694: evametattrailokyātmakaṃ gāyatryāḥ prathamaṃ padaṃ yo vedatasyaitatphalam-sa vidvānyāvatkiñcideṣu triṣu jetavyaṃ tāvatsarvaṃ ha jayati yo 'syā etadevaṃ padaṃ veda //1//
GV05brupsb5u:698: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brupsb5u:700: sa yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.2 //
GV05brupsb5u:702_0: BrhUpBh_5,14.2 tadarco yajūṃsi sāmānīti trayīvidyānāmākṣarāṇyetānyapyaṣṭāveva tathaivāṣṭākṣaraṃ
GV05brupsb5u:702_1: ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padaṃ dvitīyametadu haivāsyā etadṛgyajuḥsāmalakṣaṇamaṣṭākṣaratvasāmānyādeva /
GV05brupsb5u:703: sa yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā trayyā vidyayā yāvatphalajātamāpyate tāvaddha jayati yo 'syā etadgāyatryāsraividyalakṣaṇaṃ padaṃ veda //2//
GV05brupsb5u:707: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brupsb5u:709: sa yāvad idaṃ prāṇi tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:710: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:712: darśataṃ padam iti dadṛśa iva hy eṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:713: parorajā iti sarvam u hy evaiṣa raja upary upari tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:714: evaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā tapati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.3 //
GV05brupsb5u:716: BrhUpBh_5,14.3 tathā prāṇo 'pāno vyāna etānyapi prāṇādyabhidhānākṣarāṇyaṣṭau /
GV05brupsb5u:717: tacca gāyatryāstṛtīyaṃ padaṃ yāvadidaṃ prāṇijātaṃ tāvaddha jayati yo 'syā etadevaṃ gāyatryāstṛtīyaṃ padaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb5u:718: athānantaraṃ gāyatryāsripadāyāḥ śabdātmikāyāsturīyaṃ padamucyate 'bhidheyabhūtamasyāḥ prakṛtāyā gāyatryā etadeva vakṣyamāmaṃ turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:719: turīyamityādivākyapadārthaṃ svameva vyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-yadvai caturthaṃ prasiddhaṃ loke tadidaṃ turīyaśabdenābhidhīyate /
GV05brupsb5u:720: darśataṃ padamityasya kor'tha ityucyate-dadṛśa iva dṛśyata iva hyeṣa maṇḍalasthaḥ puruṣo rajo rajojātaṃ samastaṃ lokamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:725: yeṣāmupariṣṭātsavitā dṛśyate tadviṣaya eva sarvaśabdaḥ syādityāśaṅkānivṛttyarthā vīpsā /
GV05brupsb5u:726: “ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakānāṃ ca“iti śrutyanrāt /
GV05brupsb5u:728: yathāsau savitā sarvādhipatyalakṣaṇayā śriyā yaśasā ca khyātyā tapatyevaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā ca tapati yo 'syā etadevaṃ turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ veda //3//
GV05brupsb5u:731: saiṣā gāyatry etasmiṃs turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:735: tasmād yad idānīṃ dvau vivadamānāv eyātam aham adarśam aham aśrauṣam iti /
GV05brupsb5u:736: ya evaṃ brūyād aham adarśam iti /
GV05brupsb5u:738: tad vai tat satyaṃ bale pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05brupsb5u:741: tasmād āhur balaṃ satyād ogīya iti /
GV05brupsb5u:742: evaṃ v eṣā gāyatry adhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:746: tad yad gayāṃs tatre tasmād gāyatrī nāma /
GV05brupsb5u:747: sa yām evāmūṃ sāvitrīm anvāhaiṣaiva sā /
GV05brupsb5u:748: sa yasmā anvāha tasya prāṇāṃs trāyate // BrhUp_5,14.4 //
GV05brupsb5u:750: BrhUpBh_5,14.4 saiṣā tripadoktā yā trailokyatraividyaprāṇalakṣaṇā gāyatryetasmiṃścaturthe turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:757: tathā mūrtāmūrtātmakaṃ jagattripadā gāyatryāditye pratiṣṭhitā tadrasatvātsaha tribhiḥ pādaiḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:761_0: kathaṃ prasiddhatetyāha-tasmādyadidānīmeva dvau vivadamānau viruddhaṃ vadamānāveyātāmāgaccheyātāmahamadarśaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:761_1: dṛṣṭavānanasmītyanya āhāhamaśrauṣaṃ tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ na tathā tadvastviti tayorya evaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:761_2: brūyādahamadrākṣamiti tasmā eva śraddadhyāma napunaryo brūyādahamaśrauṣamiti /
GV05brupsb5u:762: śroturmṛṣā śravaṇamapi saṃbhavati na tu cakṣuṣo mṛṣā darśanam /
GV05brupsb5u:764: tasmātsatyapratipattihetutvātsatyaṃ cakṣustasminsatye cakṣuṣi saha tribhiritaraiḥ pādaisturīyaṃ padaṃ pratiṣṭhitamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:765: uktaṃ ca sa ādityaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti cakṣuṣīti /
GV05brupsb5u:767: kiṃ punastadbalamityāha-prāṇo vai balaṃ tasminprāṇe bale pratiṣṭhitaṃ satyam /
GV05brupsb5u:768: tathā coktaṃ sūtre tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ceti /
GV05brupsb5u:769: yasmādbale satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tasmādāhurbalaṃ satyādogīya ojīya ojastaramityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:770: loke 'pi yasminhi yadāśritaṃ bhavati tasmādāśritādāśrayasya balavattaratvaṃ prasiddham /
GV05brupsb5u:771: na hi durbalaṃ balavataḥ kvacidāśrayabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:772: evamuktanyāyena u eṣā gāyatryadhyātmamadhyātme prāṇe pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brupsb5u:776: sarvaṃ vedāḥ karmāṇi phalaṃ ca saivaṃ gāyatrī prāṇarūpā satī jagata ātmā /
GV05brupsb5u:778: ke punargayāḥ prāṇā vāgādayo vai gayāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:783: sa ācārya upanīya māṇavakamaṣṭavarṣaṃ yāmevāmūṃ gāyatrīṃ sāvitrīṃ savitṛdevatākāmanvāha pacchordharcaśaḥ samastāṃ ca /
GV05brupsb5u:784: eṣaiva sā sākṣātprāṇo jagata ātmā māṇavakāya samarpitehedānīṃ vyākhyātā nānyā sa ācāryo yasmai māṇavakāyānvāhānuvakti tasya māṇavakasya gayānprāṇāṃsrāyate narakādipatanāt //4//
GV05brupsb5u:787: tāṃ haitām eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:792: yadi ha vā apy evaṃvid bahv iva pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tad gāyatryā ekaṃ cana padaṃ prati // BrhUp_5,14.5 //
GV05brupsb5u:796: vākca śarīre sarasvatī tāmeva hi vācaṃ sarasvatīṃ māṇavakāyānubrūma ityetadvadantaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:797: na tathā kuryānna tathā vidyādyatta āhurmṛṣaiva tat /
GV05brupsb5u:801: prāṇa ukte vākca sarasvatī cānye ta prāṇāḥ sarvaṃ māṇavakāya samarpitaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb5u:802_0: kiñcedaṃ prāsaṅgikamuktvā gāyatrīvidaṃ stauti-yadi ha vā apyevaṃvidbahviva na hi
GV05brupsb5u:802_1: tasya sarvātmano bahu nāmāsti kicitsarvātmakatvādviduṣaḥ pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tatpratigrahajātaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:805: sa ya imāṃs trīṃl lokān pūrṇān pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat prathamaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:806: atha yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etad dvitīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:807: atha yāvad idaṃ prāṇi yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat tṛtīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:808: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:812_0: BrhUpBh_5,14.6 sa ya imāṃsrīnsa yo gāyatrīvidimānbhūrādīṃsrīngo 'śvādidhanapūrṇāṃllokānpratigṛhṇīyātsa
GV05brupsb5u:812_2: tena bhuktaṃ syānna tvadhikadoṣotpādakaḥ sa pratigrahaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:813: atha punaryāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yastāvatpratigṛhṇīyātso 'syā etattṛtīyaṃ padamāpnuyāt /
GV05brupsb5u:816: pādatrayasamamapi yadi kaścitpratigṛhṇīyāttatpādatrayavijñānaphalasyaiva kṣayakāraṇaṃ na tvanyasya doṣasya kartṛtve kṣamam /
GV05brupsb5u:819: dātā pratigrahītā ca yadyapyevaṃ saṃbhāvyate nāsau pratigraho 'parādhakṣamaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:821: athāsyā etadeva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brupsb5u:822: yaccaitannaiva kenacana kenacidapi pratigraheṇā'pyaṃ naiva prāpyamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:824: etānyapi naivā'pyāni kenacitkalpayitvaivamuktaṃ paramārthataḥ kuta u etāvatpratigṛhṇoyāttrailokyādisamam /
GV05brupsb5u:829: gāyatry asy ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadi /
GV05brupsb5u:832: namas te turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase /
GV05brupsb5u:834: yaṃ dviṣyād asāv asmai kāmo mā samardhīti vā /
GV05brupsb5u:835: na haivāsmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmā evam upatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:836: aham adaḥ prāpam iti vā // BrhUp_5,14.7 //
GV05brupsb5u:838: BrhUpBh_5,14.7 tasyā upasthānaṃ tasyā gāyatryā upasthānamupetya sthānaṃ namaskaraṇamanena mantreṇa /
GV05brupsb5u:839: kau'sau mantra ityāha-he gāyatryasi bhavasi trailokyapādenaikapadī trayīvidyārūpeṇa dvitīyena dvipadī /
GV05brupsb5u:842: evaṃ caturbhiḥ pādairupāsakaiḥ padyase jñāyase 'taḥ paraṃ pareṇa nirupādhikena svenā'tmanāpadasi /
GV05brupsb5u:843: avidyamānaṃ padaṃ yasyāstava yena padyase sā tvamapadasi yasmānnahi padyase neti netyātmatvāt /
GV05brupsb5u:844: ato vyavahāraviṣayāya namabhte turīyāya darśatāya padāya poradase /
GV05brupsb5u:845: asau śatruḥ pāpmā tvatprāptivighnakaro 'dastadātmanaḥ kāryaṃ yattvatprāptivighnakartṛtvaṃ mā prāpanmaiva prāpnotu /
GV05brupsb5u:847_0: yaṃ dviṣyādyaṃ prati dveṣaṃ kuryātsvayaṃ vidvāṃstaṃ pratyanenopasthānamasau śatruramukanāmeti
GV05brupsb5u:847_1: nāma gṛhṇīyādasmai yajñadattāyābhipretaḥ kāmo mā samṛddhi samṛddhiṃ mā prāpnotviti vopatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb5u:848: na haivāsmai devadattāya sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate /
GV05brupsb5u:852: asāvado mā prāpadityāditrayāṇāṃ mantrapadānāṃ yathākāmaṃ vikalpaḥ //7//
GV05brupsb5u:855: etad dha vai taj janako vaideho buḍilam āśvatarāśvim uvāca -- yan nu ho tad gāyatrīvid abrūthāḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:857: mukhaṃ hy asyāḥ samrāṇ na vidāṃ cakareti hovāca /
GV05brupsb5u:859: yadi ha vā api bahv ivāgnāv abhyādadhati sarvam eva tat saṃdahati /
GV05brupsb5u:860: evaṃ haivaivaṃvid yady api bahv iva pāpaṃ kurute sarvam eva tat saṃpsāya śuddhaḥ pūto 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ saṃbhavati // BrhUp_5,14.8 //
GV05brupsb5u:862: BrhUpBh_5,14.8 gāyatryā mukhavidhānāyārthavāda ucyate-etaddha kila vai smaryate /
GV05brupsb5u:863: tattatra gāyatrīvijñānaviṣaye janako vaideho buḍilo nāmato 'śvatarāśvasyāpatyamāśvatarāśvistaṃ kiloktavān /
GV05brupsb5u:864: yannu iti vitarke ho aho ityetattadyattvaṃ gāyatrīvidbrūthā gāyatrīvidasmīti yadabrūthāḥ kimidaṃ tasya vacaso 'nanurūpam /
GV05brupsb5u:865: atha kathaṃ yadi gāyatrīvitpratigrahadoṣeṇa hastobhūto vahasīti /
GV05brupsb5u:866: sa pratyāha rājñā smārito mukhaṃ gāyatryā hi yasmādasyā he samrāṇna vidāñcakāra na vijñātavānasmīti hovāca /
GV05brupsb5u:868: śṛṇu tarhi tasyā gāyatryā agnireva mukham /
GV05brupsb5u:869_0: yadi ha vā api bahvivendhanamagnāvabhyādadhati laukikāḥ sarvameva tatsaṃdahatyevendhanamagnirevaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:870: yadyapi bahviva pāpaṃ kurute pratigrahādidoṣaṃ tatsarvaṃ pāpajātaṃ saṃpsāya bhakṣayitvā śuddho 'gnivatpūtaśca tasmātpratigrahadoṣādgāyatryātmājaro 'mṛtaśca saṃbhavati //8//
GV05brupsb5u:875: tat tvam pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye /
GV05brupsb5u:876: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:877: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi /
GV05brupsb5u:878: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05brupsb5u:879: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara /
GV05brupsb5u:880: agne naya supathā rāye 'smān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05brupsb5u:881: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema // BrhUp_5,15.1 //
GV05brupsb5u:883: BrhUpBh_5,15.1 yo jñānakarmasamuccayakārī so 'ntakāla ādityaṃ prārthayati /
GV05brupsb5u:884: asti ca prasaṅgo gāyatryāsturīyaḥ pādo hi saḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:886: hiraṇyamayena jyotirmayena pātreṇa yathā pātreṇeṣṭaṃ vastvapidhīyata evamidaṃ satyākhyaṃ brahma jyotirmayena maṇḍalenāpihitamivāsamāhitacetasāmadṛśyatvāttaducyate /
GV05brupsb5u:887_0: satyasyāpihitaṃ mukhaṃ mukhyaṃ svarūpaṃ tadapidhānaṃ pātramapidhānamiva darśanapratibandhakāraṇaṃ
GV05brupsb5u:887_1: tattvaṃ he pūṣañjagataḥ poṣaṇatpūṣā savitāpāvṛṇvapāvṛtaṃ kuru darśanapratibandhakāraṇamapanayetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:888: satyadharmāya satyaṃ dharmo 'sya mama so 'haṃ satyadharmā tasmai tvadātmabhūtāyetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:892: sa hi sarvasya jagata ātmā cakṣuśca sansarvaṃ paśyatyeko vā gacchatītyekarṣiḥ“sūrya ekākī carati“iti mantravarṇāt /
GV05brupsb5u:893: yama sarvaṃ hi jagataḥ saṃyamanaṃ tvatkṛtam /
GV05brupsb5u:894: sūrya suṣṭhu vīrayate rasānraśmīnprāṇāndhiyo vā jagata iti /
GV05brupsb5u:895: prājāpatya prajāpaterīśvarasyāpatyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasya vā he prājāpatya vyūha vigamaya raśmīn /
GV05brupsb5u:896: samūha saṃkṣipā'tmanastejo yenāhaṃ śaknuyāṃ tvatsvarūpamañjasā draṣṭam /
GV05brupsb5u:898: yatte tava rūpaṃ sarvakalyāṇānāmatiśayena kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tatte paśyāmi /
GV05brupsb5u:900: yo 'sau bhūrbhuvaḥsvarvyāhṛtyavayavaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣākṛtitvātpuruṣaḥ so 'hamasmi bhavāmi /
GV05brupsb5u:901: aharamiti copaniṣada uktatvādādityacākṣuṣayostadevedaṃ parāmṛśyate so 'hamasmyamṛtamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:902: mamāmṛtasya satyasya śarīrapāte śarīrastho yaḥ prāṇo vāyuḥ so 'nilaṃ bāhyaṃ vāyumeva pratigacchatu /
GV05brupsb5u:903: tathānyā devatāḥ svāṃ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gacchantu /
GV05brupsb5u:905: athedānīmātmanaḥ saṃkalpabhūtāṃ manasi vyavasthitāmagnidevatāṃ prārthayate-oṃ krato /
GV05brupsb5u:909: he oṃ he krato smara smartavyamantakāle hi tvatsmaraṇavaśādiṣṭā gatiḥ prāpyate 'taḥ prārthyate yanmayā kṛtaṃ tatsmara punaruktirādarārthā /
GV05brupsb5u:910: kiñca he 'gne naya prāpaya supathā śobhanena mārgeṇa rāye dhanāya karmaphalaprāptaya ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb5u:911: na dakṣiṇena kṛṣṇena punarāvṛttiyuktena kiṃ tarhi śuklenaiva supathāsmānviśvāni sarvāṇi he deva vayunāni prajñānāni sarvaprāṇināṃ vidvān /
GV05brupsb5u:912: kiñca yuyodhyapanaya viyojayāsmadasmatto juhurāṇaṃ kuṭilamenaḥ pāpaṃ pāpajātaṃ sarvam /
GV05brupsb5u:913: tena pāpena viyuktā vayameṣyāma uttareṇa pathā tvatprasādāt /
GV05brupsb5u:914: kintu vayaṃ tubhyaṃ paricaryāṃ kartuṃ na śaknumo bhūyiṣṭhāṃ bahutamāṃ te tubhyaṃ namauktiṃ namaskāravacanaṃ vidhema namaskāroktyā paricaremetyarthaḥ /
